mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NO,Q.MEM_EMAIl, Q.QNA_OPEN_WHET,Q.QNA_TITLE,Q.MEM_NAME,Q.QNA_HIT,Q.QNA_DAY,Q.QNA_PHY_ROU, COUNT(R.REPLY_NO) AS COUNT FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN REPLY R ON Q.QNA_NO = R.QNA_NO GROUP BY Q.QNA_NO,Q.MEM_EMAIl,Q.QNA_OPEN_WHET,Q.QNA_TITLE,Q.MEM_NAME,Q.QNA_HIT,Q.QNA_DAY,Q.QNA_PHY_ROU ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(QNA_NO) + 1, 1 ) AS QNA_NO FROM QNA
INSERT INTO QNA(QNA_NO,QNA_TITLE,QNA_OPEN_WHET, QNA_CON, QNA_PHY_ROU, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL) VALUES(#{qna_no}, #{qna_title},#{qna_open_whet}, #{qna_con}, #{qna_phy_rou}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_email})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QNA_TITLE = #{qna_title}, QNA_CON = #{qna_con}, QNA_OPEN_WHET =#{qna_open_whet}, QNA_PHY_ROU = #{qna_phy_rou} WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
UPDATE QNA SET QNA_HIT = QNA_HIT + 1 WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE 1 = 1 WHERE QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%' WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%'
